_sText:
HELLO IM BACK FROM A LOOOONG BREAK
==================

Changes:
------------------

- back to 16 Playerspawns from 32 reasons below
- Fixed a Bug where people couldnt place a Bomb anymore
- simpler area dmg detectors (boxes instead of balls > better performance)
- throw distance increased

### Reason why 16 players only:

Since someone said that it crashes the server i think that its to heavy with 32 Players throwing bombs at the same time since a Bomberman game is usually played with 4 Players only not 32!!
The second reason is the entity limit. with 32 Players the limit was almost reached. Now if there are some server side entitys added they surpass 2048 and crash the game

I moved it to Other/misc section because its clearly not a minigame
If this map is stable without bugs i will make more bomberman maps


How to play
------------------

Aim is to kill the enemy team
With E you throw bombs
When looking on the ground while pressing E
you lay a bomb
You can kick a layed bomb by running towards the bomb
There are boxes that can be broken to aquire amazing power ups

Power ups
------------------

- Extrabomb.......you can lay 1 more bomb at same time
- Firepower.......Aoe radius increases
- Health..........You get 25 hp
- Superhealth.....Full heal and HP cap to 150
- Speed...........you run faster

### Bomb Types

- Icebomb..........Slows
- Firebomb.........Molotov Coctail
- Electrobomb......Stuns
- Windbomb.........Throws you in the air  **REMOVED**

After 3 minutes of gametime sudden death starts
which cause the lava to rise

- 16 CT Spawns
- 16 T Spawns

Current Bugs Statement
------------------

##### Players unable to lay a bomb
FIXED!!!!

Post comment
